file_content.text: It's a great honor to speak with the warrior who struck down the Emperor. The Republic needs your strong arm once again.
Jedi are strongest when defending others, Madame Chancellor, but I'll help however I can.
I prefer peace to war.
Sadly, protecting the innocent often means striking down the guilty.
It's about time you contacted me. With the Emperor out of the way, the Sith are primed for a fall.
Ready to destroy the Sith?
I regret our greatest foe must wait while we deal with a new enemy.
I'm honored to speak with you again, Master Jedi. Your victory over the Sith infiltrators saved the Republic, but we face new threats to our security.
Eliminating one foe often exposes the presence of others, Chancellor. Lasting peace of mind is difficult to obtain.
I am always ready to help.
Be that as it may, lasting peace and security are my goals. We must remain vigilant and primed to strike.
I am not your personal stalking hound, Madame Chancellor. I pursue my own path.
Do not presume to use me.
We both desire peace and security to pursue our agendas. A foe has risen who must be defeated.
I apologize for contacting you outside normal channels, Major, but I need Havoc Squad immediately.
We're prepared to handle anything you need, Madame Chancellor. It'll be good to get back in the fight.
My team stands ready to serve.
That's the spirit we'll need to triumph over our foes--and it appears we have a new one.
With all due respect, Chancellor, you don't have military authority. I won't jump when you bark.
I don't take orders from you.
General Garza has authorized this call. To be clear, I'm not requesting a favor.
Captain, congratulations again on your defeat of the Voidwolf. I require a moment of your time to discuss matters of galactic security.
If this is about missing valuables or some kind of illegal enterprise operating in Republic space, I have no idea why you're calling me.
I didn't do it, I swear.
Your knowledge of shadow economies is the asset I seek. I require expert help with a particular breed of criminal.
It isn't every day the leader of the free galaxy calls. How can I help you, Madame Chancellor?
This is a rare honor.
Doesn't matter if I'm talking or blasting--I charge a flat fee. Can you afford it?
My time costs credits.
I'm prepared to negotiate for your special expertise. We're facing a foe I believe you can provide special insight into.
The Hutt Cartel has invaded Republic space and seized the planet Makeb. We will respond to this unprovoked act of aggression in full force.
My war council will be convening on Keylander Station in the Makeb system. I ask that you join us immediately.
You're in luck. I just landed at the station.
I'm already at Makeb.
My people will be arriving at the conference chamber shortly. We'll meet you there.
I'll set a course for the Makeb system right now.
I'm on my way to Makeb.
Do you know why the Hutts have invaded Makeb?
Can you tell me anything more?
Supreme Commander Jace Malcom and Jedi Grand Master Satele Shan are gathering intelligence on the situation. I promise a full briefing as soon as possible.
What's there to discuss? The Hutts have crossed the line. We'll make them pay for it.
Let's just smash the Hutts.
I'm afraid the situation's more complex than either of us would like.
Proceed to the conference chamber on Keylander Station. I'll meet you there. Please hurry--we must act quickly and decisively against the Hutts' aggression.
Please stand by for a priority communication from Supreme Chancellor Leontyne Saresh of the Galactic Republic.
